name: Mr. Traffic
description:
Tap cars to make them go. Avoid crashing for a high score!

Meet Mr. Traffic: a music conductor now conducting traffic thanks to an admin error… but that won't stop him from making music!

Features:
• TAP to play
• Make MUSIC (sort of)
• 1000s of FASHION combinations
• EVER-CHANGING gameplay
• SHARE with friends
• PAY-WHAT-YOU-LIKE to Remove Ads
